submodules.title: Project Scoping Assistant
submodules.description: An AI-driven tool that helps clients articulate their project ideas into structured modules, ensuring clarity and feasibility from the outset.

submodules.title: Budget Allocation System
submodules.description: Utilizes AI algorithms to assess the importance and complexity of each module, providing a fair budget distribution that reflects the project's needs.

submodules.title: Task Allocation Engine
submodules.description: Automatically assigns tasks to developers based on their skills, availability, and past performance, optimizing resource utilization.

submodules.title: Fund Allocation Dashboard
submodules.description: A user-friendly interface that displays real-time information on fund distribution, ensuring clients and developers can track financial resources transparently.

submodules.title: Progress Tracking System
submodules.description: Monitors project milestones and deliverables, providing stakeholders with updates on the status of tasks and overall project health.

submodules.title: Governance Framework
submodules.description: Establishes a decentralized governance model where stakeholders can vote on project decisions, ensuring that all voices are heard and considered.

submodules.title: Dispute Resolution Mechanism
submodules.description: A structured process for resolving conflicts between clients and developers, leveraging community input and smart contracts to ensure fairness.

submodules.title: Self Protocol Integration
submodules.description: A system that verifies developer identities through a decentralized protocol, ensuring that only qualified individuals can participate in projects.

submodules.title: Reputation Management System
submodules.description: Tracks developer contributions and feedback, allowing clients to assess potential collaborators based on their past performance and community ratings.

submodules.title: GitHub Activity Analysis
submodules.description: Monitors developers' GitHub activities in real-time, validating their contributions and ensuring that work submitted aligns with project requirements.

submodules.title: Task Validation Protocol
submodules.description: An automated system that verifies completed tasks against project specifications, ensuring quality and adherence to standards before approval.

submodules.title: Smart Contract Escrow
submodules.description: Utilizes smart contracts to hold funds securely until project milestones are met, ensuring that payments are only released upon satisfactory completion of work.

submodules.title: Compensation Negotiation Tool
submodules.description: Facilitates discussions between clients and developers regarding compensation, allowing for transparent negotiations based on project scope and developer expertise.
